uk.ac.uea.mathsthing

Class SimpleParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.uea.mathsthing.SimpleParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, IFormulaParser, IObservable

    public class SimpleParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFormulaParser, IObservable, java.lang.Runnable
    A simplistic parser that converts a formula from infix notation to postfix. Provides methods to access both the infix and postfix notations, allowing them to be displayed to the user if needed. Generates a evaluation tree of the postfix notation, which can be evaluated. Evaluation can take a mapping of variables to values.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jordan Woerner

      • getResult

        public java.math.BigDecimal getResult(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> params)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: IFormulaParser
        Gets the resulting number from using the stored formula with the provided parameter values replacing the parameter names in the tokens.
        Specified by:
        getResult in interface IFormulaParser
        Parameters:
        params - A mapping of the parameter token names to their required values. A parameter can only be mapped in this set once.
        Returns:
        A floating point value from the result of the computation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if there is an error when evaluating the formula.
